name: Survive the cubes!
description:
Survive the cubes! is an indie game which you'll need to survive the cubes, as the title already said. You spawn in a lonely world but you realise pretty soon that you're not alone.

If you find any bugs, please leave them in the comments! Make sure to click on the info button to see the controls! Linux version has been added since version 1.1!

Status: game still receives updates
